ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 pound) corned beef brisket, seasoning packet discarded

cookingTips: Discard the included seasoning packet and use fresh spices for better flavor control
Beer adds subtle sweetness and helps break down tough fibers in the brisket
Slice against the grain for maximum tenderness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how beer's acidity tenderizes corned beef and why slicing against the grain is crucial for the best texture.
